'''12w50b''' is the third and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.4.6]], released on December 14, 2012,<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20121217030250/https://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-snapshot-12w50b</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[12w50a]]. This is the final snapshot released in 2012.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Enchanting]]'''
* [[Thorns]] damage is now customizable.
* [[Fire Protection]] now extinguishes players more quickly.
* [[Blast Protection]] now reduces explosion recoil.

|;dev
|4191|Unusable ingredients in fireworks are used when crafting.

|4580|Unbreaking does not work on armor.
|4584|Opening an GUI will show the item name in the hotbar again.
|4612|Enchanted item bug in 3D.
